title: Sharp on British Rights - Historical Development

content.question: The publication of Sharp’s essay for a colonial American audience best reflects which of the following developments in the 1770s?

choices.label: The growing appeal of Loyalism among many colonists
The influence of religion on colonists’ ideas about natural law
The mobilization of ordinary men and women to pressure British colonial officials
The strategy of emphasizing the rights of British subjects to oppose colonial taxation

content.answer: The strategy of emphasizing the rights of British subjects to oppose colonial taxation

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Identify  a source's point of view, purpose, historical situation, and/or audience.
